title: Software Engineer I
bullets: Design and develop back-end features for multiple micro-services using Node.js.
Implement new features and maintain Modulus.io using Ampersand, Express, and Sass with Bootstrap.
Support open source Node.js modules for Modulus including the Modulus Command Line application.
Assist the technical support engineer with customer tickets.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
bullets: Created and maintained sites using WordPress and Sitefinity content management systems, MVC frameworks such as Laravel, e-commerce systems, and custom code as well as semantic HTML5, CSS3, and advanced JavaScript.
Coordinated with project managers and designers to brainstorm solutions for clients on strict deadlines.
Assisted clients with site features and website maintenance.
